thread.title: Saina Nehwal loses as India’s campaign ends at French Open
thread.title_full: Saina Nehwal loses as India’s campaign ends at French Open | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Saina Nehwal loses as India’s campaign ends at French Open
text:
Other Articles Cristiano Ronaldo sets the tone as Real Madrid top La Liga table Arsenal top Premier League table with 2-1 win over Everton Giroud, Koscielny head Arsenal to win over porous Everton Ace Indian shuttler Saina Nehwal bowed out of the French Open Super Series after suffering a straight games defeat against Thailand’s Ratchanok Intanon in the women’s singles quarterfinals.
The top-seeded Indian was beaten 9-21, 15-21 by Intanon in a contest that lasted 40 minutes and thereby ended India’s campaign at the tournament.
The defeat saw Saina, who dropped to second in the latest world rankings, made her thrid successive early exit after being eliminated in initial rounds of Japan Open and Denmark Open.
 24, 2015 12:55 pm
